text: Iâ€™m looking to filter by services and order results by distance. The filters work but the sorting does not. What am I doing wrong? `{% for row in hubdb_table_rows(table_id, filter_params  "&orderBy=geo_distance(location,"~request.query_dict['latitude']~","~request.query_dict['longitude']~",mi)") %}`
If you add `hsDebug=true` to the preview page you should be able to see the exact HubDB query made. This is useful to see if this a HubL mistake or query mistake
